mapper.select: select count(*) from emp e, comm d, comm t, comm r,cmt c where e.dep_num = d.code and e.team_num = t.code and e.rnk_num = r.code and e.emp_num = c.emp_num order by to_char(c.cmt_srt,'YYYY-MM-DD') desc, e.dep_num,e.rnk_num

select count(*) from emp e, comm d, comm t, comm r,cmt c where e.dep_num = d.code and e.team_num = t.code and e.rnk_num = r.code and e.emp_num = c.emp_num and to_char(c.cmt_srt,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{searchStart} and #{searchEnd}>=to_char(c.cmt_srt,'YYYY-MM-DD') order by to_char(c.cmt_srt,'YYYY-MM-DD') desc, e.dep_num,e.rnk_num

select count(*) from emp e, comm d, comm t, comm r,cmt c where e.dep_num = d.code and e.team_num = t.code and e.rnk_num = r.code and e.emp_num = c.emp_num and to_char(c.cmt_srt,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= #{searchStart} and #{searchEnd}>=to_char(c.cmt_srt,'YYYY-MM-DD') and d.content = #{searchDept} order by to_char(c.cmt_srt,'YYYY-MM-DD') desc, e.dep_num,e.rnk_num
